page.title: 01Victoria's Day
page.content: I wake up in the morning at 7.58 a.m. and get dressed and go into Mum's and Dad's bedroom. I say, "Good morning", and then I go downstairs. As I open the door my dog Sally jumps with joy. I climb on a chair and open the cupboard door and get Sally's favourite breakfast, sugar puffs. I have sugar puffs as well, and switch the coffee machine off and have the last cup of coffee. I brush my hair, have a wash and clean my teeth, and then I go to school. At school we have Assembly. After that Jane and Sarah go to Basket-ball and we play with the Banties. After that Miss Lomas goes to collect Sarah and Jane,and then we have dinner. After dinner we work until home-time.
